2012680.name: NeoPunk™ Destiny City
2012680.description:
How corporate wants us to describe the game...

"Time is running out. After a night of mistakes, you wake up to find that your best friend, Tommy, is in danger. You have just hours to return a stolen case to its rightful owner, or both of you will face the consequences. With gang territories to cross and the authorities on your tail, you must navigate the perilous streets of Destiny City to make things right.

Experience the Thrill in Virtual Reality Immersive NeoPunk World: Dive into a richly detailed city where every district tells a different story, blending past and future in a NeoPunk revolution.

  • Maglev Movement Mechanics: Equip advanced maglev gear to glide effortlessly through the city, defying gravity and exploring new heights.

  • High-Stakes Storyline: Race against time to save Tommy, making critical decisions that will affect both your destinies.

  • Intense First-Person Combat: Engage in visceral battles with gang members and evade law enforcement using intuitive VR controls.

  • Dynamic Environments: Traverse diverse levels that challenge your skills, from neon-lit streets to towering skyscrapers.

  • Your Choices Shape Your Destiny Step into the shoes of Cass and take control of your fate.

  • Will you outsmart those who stand in your way and save your only friend, or will the city's dangers overcome you? The future is in your hands in Destiny City."

How WE want to tell you about our game...

You fucked up. Big time.

You had one day to make it to the other side of the NeoSeaTac megalopolis, but you got drunk instead and overslept. It’s not uncommon for you to screw up something as simple as taking an autolift to the Spire at the center of the city, but now you have no choice but to cut through gangcorp territory if you want any chance to make it to the drop-off in time, and they aren’t going to be happy about it. It doesn’t matter that this isn’t all your fault; your best and only friend Tommy’s in the hospital, and you were the one who stole that case from the Senator’s car. You should have known boosting random cars for whatever you can find to sell would land you up shitfuck’s creek eventually. The stuff is too hot to get rid of, and no one wants to even hear about it because it’s that damn hot.

If you don’t get this back to the owner in time, you and Tommy are dead—as in dead-dead. And while you don’t seem to value life enough to care for yourself anymore, what little humanity a small-time crook like you still has inside manifests in caring for Tommy and not wanting the ONLY person who gives two shits about you to get hurt for something he had nothing to do with. He’s just leverage to them, and it ain’t fair, kid.

You’re gonna have to get over your hate for modern gadgets and get into some magline gear to let you ride the mag. Yeah, it’s illegal, but what isn’t these days? The real problem is, if the Romans catch you in their part of town, you are going to have to literally fight your way out of it. Punch for punch.

Alright, time to learn to bumper jump in less than 10 minutes and save not only your life, but Tommy's too.

Man, this would be a lot easier if you weren’t hung over, but fuck it, here we go…

Features:

-> A Rich NeoPunk World: Explore a city where each level is a canvas for a different era’s reinterpretation, all contributing to the NeoPunk revolution.

-> Maglev Mechanics: Experience the thrill of seamless movement as you glide on advanced Maglev skates, interacting with a world where gravity is just a suggestion.

-> A Story of Stakes and Friendship: Unravel the narrative woven with themes of trust, urgency, and the weight of consequences as you strive to fulfill your promise to Tommy.

-> Join the Odyssey: Step into the skates of Cass and carve your path through the stratified society of Destiny City. Will you deliver hope or despair? Your destiny awaits in NeoPunk's Destiny City.

...we think ours is better.
